meta.description: Couples prompts with 5 heat levels, diverse categories, comfort controls, and relationship duration targeting

new.label: New Relationship
new.description: Less than 1 month together - getting to know each other

developing.label: Developing Relationship
developing.description: 1 month to 1 year - building connection and trust

mature.label: Mature Relationship
mature.description: 3-5 years - navigating life together with stability

long_term.label: Long-term Relationship
long_term.description: 5+ years - deep partnership and shared history
